thread.title: Japan's Fujifilm snaps up Xerox in $6.1 bln deal

title: Japan's Fujifilm snaps up Xerox in $6.1 bln deal
text:
Japan's Fujifilm snaps up Xerox in $6.1 bln deal 12:56pm EST - 01:20 
Japan's Fujifilm Holdings is set to take over Xerox Corp, and combine the U.S. company into their joint venture Fuji Xerox in an effort to cut costs. As Silvia Antonioli reports, Fujifilm will own 50.1 percent of Xerox shares.   
Japan's Fujifilm Holdings is set to take over Xerox Corp, and combine the U.S. company into their joint venture Fuji Xerox in an effort to cut costs. As Silvia Antonioli reports, Fujifilm will own 50.1 percent of Xerox shares.  //reut.rs/2DRgbfT
